attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is necessary that the police bring charges against MPs who had fraudulently claimed expenses, knowing they were not in a position to make a legitimate claim.
Just because they are MPs does not mean they are above the law - actually they should set examples to the normal man in the street, who, had he been caught with his hands in the till, would have been thrown in jail and charged with fraud.  Something has to be done and done quickly and examples must be made of fraudsters.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
